scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Blog_Banner_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set ($blog = $core_v2_blog.Current) #if (!$blog) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #set ($post = false) #set ($renderTitle = $core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('renderTitle', true)) #set ($renderPoster = $core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('renderPoster', true)) #if ($renderTitle || $renderPoster) #set($post = $core_v2_blogPost.Current) #end $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('style.vm')
#if ($renderTitle && $post)
$post.Title
#else
$blog.Name
#if ($blog.Description)
$blog.Description
#end #end
## Custom Navigation #set ($navigationItems = $core_v2_customNavigation.Deserialize($core_v2_widget.GetCustomValue('navigation', ''))) #foreach($navigationItem in $navigationItems) #beforeall
    #each
  • $!navigationItem.Label
    • #afterall
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('more')
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('cancel')
#end
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" resourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" resourceName="CF_Title" dataType="string" defaultValue="${resource:Blog_Banner_Name}" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.ContentFragmentTokenStringControl, Telligent.Evolution.Platform" /> <property id="renderTitle" resourceName="renderTitle" descriptionResourceName="renderTitle_desc" dataType="bool" defaultValue="True" /> <property id="renderPoster" resourceName="renderPoster" descriptionResourceName="renderPoster_desc" dataType="bool" defaultValue="False" /> <property id="navigation" dataType="custom" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.CustomNavigationCustomControl, resourceName="shadow" /> <property id="border" descriptionResourceName="border_desc" dataType="bool" defaultValue="True" resourceName="border" /> </propertyGroup>

language.resource: Add, edit, delete, and reorder custom navigation links.
Customize your blog's banner design. The blog banner's design overrides the group banner's design.
Select a color palette for your blog's banner, or create a custom one.
When provided, a cover photo is rendered as the banner's background.
When selected, cover photo is blurred. This is useful for legibility of overlaid text when using a complex image.
When selected, cover photo is shadowed to increase legibility of text on a light photo
Render a shadow beneath the banner. When the bottom border is enabled, only renders when scrolled.
Render a bottom border beneath the banner. When the bottom shadow is enabled, only renders when not scrolled.
Customize your blog's banner with a cover photo or color palette.
When selected, renders post title on post pages instead of the blog name.
When selected, renders post image as the banner background on post pages when available instead of the configured design.

scriptedContentFragment.additionalCssScript: #set ($post = false) #set ($renderPoster = $core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('renderPoster', true)) #if ($renderPoster) #set($post = $core_v2_blogPost.Current) #end #if ($renderPoster && $post && $post.PostImageUrl && $post.PostImageUrl.length > 0) with-cover-photo with-shadow #else #set ($designMode = $core_v2_widget.GetStringValue('designMode', 'inherit')) #if ($designMode == 'photo') #set ($coverPhotoUrl = false) #set ($coverPhotoUrl = $core_v2_widget.GetUrlValue('coverPhotoUrl', '')) #if ($coverPhotoUrl && $coverPhotoUrl.Length > 0) with-cover-photo #end #set ($blurCoverPhoto = $core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('blurCoverPhoto', true)) #if ($blurCoverPhoto) with-blur #end #set ($shadowCoverPhoto = $core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('shadowCoverPhoto', false)) #if ($shadowCoverPhoto) with-shadow #end #end #end
